Name: Tropic Thunder
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Crème de Pêche de Vigne liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dust with freshly ground black pepper.
Review: Gin, peach, lemon juice and pineapple juice may not seem the most obvious combination but it's a combo that works.
History: Created by Sean Henry at Epernay Champagne Bar, Leeds, England and to quote Sean is "named Tropic Thunder as it aptly describes what to expect on the palate."
Nutrition: One serving of Tropic Thunder contains 176 calories
